home.leds_content: Highlight your way to the top is an outstanding feature
home.adjustable_content: You may change wall angle from 0 to 70 degree
home.target_audience_content: Entertaining for experienced climbers and beginners as well
home.olympic_content: Rock climbing is an olympic sport since 2020 in Tokyo. Bouldering is one of the three disciplines.
home.stay_fit_content: Climbing is an exellent activity to stay in shape and burn fat from each part of your body.
home.be_stronger_content: With regular trainings you will notice how your muscles strength grows.
home.problem_solving_content: Besides physical abilities you also should use your brain when you solve some unusual boulder problems.
home.feel_the_progress_content: Unlike other sport climbing gives you an apparent progressing experience with it's grade system. The stronger and experienced you get the higher grade you may climb.
home.fun_content: It's much more fun when you appeal to some problem with your friends.
home.subheader: Small climbing gym with primary focus on Kilterboard trainings
home.what_is_text1: The Kilter Board was designed to suit the needs of a users of all abilities so gyms will be able to use the board for their entire customer base.
home.what_is_text2: Everyone, regardless of level, can enjoy the intuitive lights to climb, set, and interact with other climbers around the world!

signin.title: Sign in
signin.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up

signup.title: Create new account
signup.fill_all_to_proceed: Please fill all the fields above to proceed
signup.code_sent: We sent you confirmation code. Check your mail.
signup.wrong_code: Wrong confirmation code. Probably it's already outdated. Please return back and send another confirmation email.
signup.name: Name (visible to others)
signup.climbing_footer: leave it as default 5A-6A if you don't understand the grade system yet
signup.registration_complete: Registration complete. You may sign in with specified email and password.

password_reset.title: Reset password
password_reset.code_sent: Please check your email. You will receive confirmation code if such email was registered.
password_reset.complete: Password was successfully changed. You may login now.
